<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lodestone Bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1904)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 44 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Lodestone bombs hold reactive ionized minerals preserved in a dormant state until broken. The bomb grants an item bonus to attack rolls and deals force damage and force splash damage, according to the bomb's type. In addition, a target made of metal, wearing metal armor, or using metal weapons takes [persistent force damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and is [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) while taking the persistent damage. The persistent damage can last up to 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"

>
Lodestone Bomb
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 44 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls, and the bomb deals 3d4 force damage plus 2 force splash damage. The bomb deals 2d4 persistent force damage to applicable targets.
